column3: â€œMan this strain is chronic! Smoke this and it instantly hits you like a brick wall! Got hold of a sample so didn't have too much and ended up sharing one joints worth between 3 of us - and it's a good job too. Fried the lot of us and safe to assume you don't need much of this to feel the full effects. Was a smooth smoke which took me by surprise but nevertheless a bonus.  At first I was in a heavy body high state, bu...â€

â€œI experienced the most intense happiness and deepest sadness all at once and I loved every moment of it! my mind was alert the whole time, me and my husband had the best bonding experience last night on this stuff. We chattered, and shared so much about ourselves and each other. I must say, I love the deep awareness of myself and others that I felt last night after smoking this strain. Definately my favourite so far!...â€

â€œThe buds I got l are a light green and not dense at all.  Very light feeling actually.   Quite a few orange hairs throughout with a  sweet almost skunky scent.

â€œThis strain is amazing. I get migraines and I've tried a lot of different strains. I've found a few that help prevent migraines, but this is the first one that actually got rid of a full blown one.
